text: 2AM is a four-member South Korean K-pop and ballad boy group formed under JYP Entertainment as a counterpart to 2PM. The group rose to fame with their song, "Can't Let You Go, Even If I Die" in 2010. In 2015, Seulong and Jinwoon announced they were leaving JYP. Changmin later made the same announcement in August 2015, though JYP announced soon after that 2AM was not disbanded. They came back in 2021. In September 2017, Jo Kwon left JYP. ==Discography== ===Albums=== *Saint O' Clock (2010) *One Spring Day (2011) *Voice (2013) *Let's Talk (2014) ===Mini-Albums=== *Can't Let You Go, Even If I Die (2010) *F.Scott Fitzgerald's Way of Love (2012) *Nocturne (2013) ===Single Albums=== *This Song (2008) *A Time For Confession (2008) ===Repackages=== *I Was Wrong (2010) ==References== Category:2008 establishments in South Korea Category:Hybe Corporation artists Category:K-pop music groups Category:JYP Entertainment artists Category:Musical groups established in 2008 Category:Musical quartets Category:South Korean boy bands Category:South Korean R&B; bands
title: 2AM
